document.full_text: heavy weapons fire rang out in central abidjan on thursday after presidential claimant alassane ouattara's forces marched into ivory coast's main city, and his camp said incumbent laurent gbagbo had just hours left in power.
document.title: heavy fighting after ouattara troops reach abidjan
lines_and_colors: heavy weapons fire rang out in central abidjan on thursday after presidential claimant alassane ouattara's forces marched into ivory coast's main city, and his camp said incumbent laurent gbagbo had just hours left in power.
